alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 5:11AM MST until January 14 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches, mainly in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph today. * WHERE...Portions of west central Idaho and northeast Oregon. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be a break in the snow this afternoon through Saturday morning before more snow arrives Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
